DOC.brief_summary: Women dense breast ( BIRADS 3 4 ) BIRADS category 1 2 mammogram ask participate automate volume breast ultrasound scanner . The study evaluate prospectively change recall rate , positive biopsy rate , cancer detection rate BIRADS category 3 lesion give 1 year follow-up recommendation .
DOC.detailed_description: Women dense breast ( BIRADS 3 4 ) BIRADS category 1 2 mammogram ask participate automate volume breast ultrasound scanner . If woman agree participate sign inform consent undergoes automate whole breast scan . The scan interpreted independent mammogram . Scans assign BIRADS category score 1 , 2 , 3 , 0 . BIRADS category 3 lesion report evidence malignancy 1 year follow-up recommend . BIRADS category 0 lesion request hand hold ultrasound include elastography . Follow determine BIRADS score elastography result hand hold ultrasound . The study evaluate prospectively change recall rate , positive biopsy rate , cancer detection rate BIRADS category 3 lesion give 1 year follow-up recommendation .
DOC.criteria: Women age > 18 schedule routine screening mammogram . Women Density 3 4 BIRADS category 1 mammogram ask participate study Inability give inform consent
